from pyspark.sql.functions import lit, monotonically_increasing_id, trim
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from functools import reduce

class AEManualCopy(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)
        
        
    def mergeAll(self):

        root_dir = f'{self.stage1np}' #"/_AE_ManualUploadRawFiles"
        primaryreport_list = []
        learningreport_list = []
        
        # for each file location in this manual upload directory..
        file_list = mssparkutils.fs.ls(root_dir)
        for file in file_list:
            # ignore subfolders
            if file.isDir:
                continue
                
            # .. we need to dissect the filename to get the school name, area, semester number and year
            tokens = file.name.split("-")
            school_name = tokens[0].strip()
            school_area = tokens[1].strip()

            semester = tokens[2].split(" ")[2].strip()

            #print(semester_tokens[1])

            year = tokens[2].split(" ")[3].strip()
            report_type = tokens[2].split(" ")[4].strip()

            filename = f'{self.stage1np}/{file.name}'

            # if the file is not a primary semester or learning task results report, then skip the file
            if (report_type == 'Primary'):
                df = self._addReportDetails(filename, school_name, school_area, semester, year)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                primaryreport_list.append(df)

                # add the new df to the list 
            elif (report_type == 'Learning'):
                df = self._addReportDetails(filename, school_name, school_area, semester, year)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                learningreport_list.append(df)

            else:
                continue #skip files that are not 'primary' or 'learning' reports
                

        # once we have all of the files converted to dataframes with the extra columns, we can combined them back to one file
        if primaryreport_list:
            primary_combined_df =  reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, primaryreport_list)
            # add an index to the combined tables 
            primary_indexed_df = primary_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())
            # save the csv files
            primary_indexed_df.coalesce(1).write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/AE_ManualSemesterReports')
        
        if learningreport_list:
            learning_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, learningreport_list)
            learning_indexed_df = learning_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())      
            learning_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/AE_ManualLearningTasks')


    def _addReportDetailsPrimary(self, file, school_name, school_area, semester, year):

        # schema of the Primary Semester Reports
        schema = StructType() \
                .add("StudentFirstName", StringType(),True) \
                .add("StudentLastName", StringType(),True) \
                .add("StudentCode", StringType(),True) \
                .add("GovtCode1", StringType(),True) \
                .add("StudentYearLevel", StringType(),True) \
                .add("StudentFormGroup", StringType(),True) \
                .add("StudentHouseGroup", StringType(),True) \
                .add("Subject", StringType(),True) \
                .add("ClassCode", StringType(),True) \
                .add("Teacher", StringType(),True) \
                .add("AssessmentType", StringType(),True) \
                .add("AssessmentArea", StringType(),True) \
                .add("Result", StringType(),True) 

        df_with_schema = spark.read.format("csv") \
                        .option("header", True) \
                        .schema(schema) \
                        .load(file)

        #df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(file)

        # add the new columns and the value for each column
        final_df = df_with_schema.withColumn('School Name', lit(school_name)) \
                        .withColumn('Area', lit(school_area)) \
                        .withColumn('Semester', lit(semester)) \
                        .withColumn('Year', lit(year))

        return final_df


    def _addReportDetails(self, file, school_name, school_area, semester, year):
        df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(file)

        # add the new columns and the value for each column
        final_df = df.withColumn('School Name', lit(school_name)) \
                        .withColumn('Area', lit(school_area)) \
                        .withColumn('Semester', lit(semester)) \
                        .withColumn('Year', lit(year))

        return final_df


source_folder = "/_AE_Test"

# instantiate the AE Manual Data Copy with a source folder that contains all the ingested data files 
aecopy = AEManualCopy(source_folder)

aecopy.mergeAll()
